original_definition: '1-star compartment' means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 6 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
generated_definition: '1-star compartment' means a compartment with a fire risk assessment rating of 1, indicating a low risk of fire and a low potential for harm to people.

Article 2: ‘1-star compartment’ means a frozen compartment with a target temperature and storage conditions of - 6 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
‘1-star compartment’ means afrozen compartmentwith atarget temperature and storage conditions of - 6 °C, as set out in Annex III, Table 3;
